Text:
(First, I'll need to retrieve the mask. Cid's room
should be around here―)
(...Someone's coming out? It's―)

This was the only thing I ended up finding...
What is this mask anyway?
(Lady Claire?! And she's holding the mask...!)
(...Let's follow her for a bit.)
...Nothing in this book, either...

(There's nothing about this mask in Midgar's art or
history...)

(Could it be from another country...? Hold on,
why would Cid even have this?!)

*sigh* This would be so much easier if I could just
ask him directly...
Excuse me. Could I have a moment, please?
...Who are you? Sorry but I'm busy right now.

My apologies. I work on the library committee.
I'm sorry for disturbing you.
But I'm just so happy to finally find that mask―

You know about this mask? Then, do you also know
about Cid...?!

Tell me! Where is Cid right now, and what is he up
to?!

I'm afraid I don't know anything about that. I only
know about that mask.
I-I see...

In that case, what is this mask? I couldn't find
anything about it in my research.

It's a unique item distributed only to a limited
number of aristocrats in Oriana. It doubles as
an invitation to a ball.

So, my brother was invited to a ball? Who would
invite him...?!

Wait, are you saying you took your brother's mask
without permission?

What choice did I have? I thought it would provide a
valuable clue to finding my missing brother.
But now I'm sure. He must be in Oriana Kingdom―
Urgh...! Not again...
Are you okay?

Just an ache in my left hand... Honestly, what even
is this...?

(Lady Claire doesn't yet realize what the mark carved
on her left hand is―)

(...Could this be a ploy to make her aware of the
demon Diablos?!)
So that's what it was...
Huh?

No, it's nothing. About what I mentioned earlier...
It would be futile to go to Oriana on your own.

What do you mean? How could I not go if Cid might be
be there? I don't have any other choice!

That mask is part of a pair. Going alone would mean
you'd be turned away at the door.
As for the other half of the pair...it's right here.

...What are you suggesting by showing me that?
Do you want me to hand over my mask?
No, not at all. I'd like you to join me at the ball.

I'm sure it would be an excellent opportunity to
learn various things about your brother and more...

(Sounds shady... But since she has a similar mask,
it's probably not entirely false...)

(...No, there's no time to hesitate! If Cid was
invited to the ball, someone there must know
about him!)
Alright, let's work together.

Thank you. With my connections, we can safely enter
Oriana. And don't worry about the return trip.
We'll depart in two days. See you then, Claire.
Huh? How do you know my name―
...And she's gone already. Who even was that woman?

(Since she has a mask that pairs with Cid's,
there might be some connection, but...)

(What is their relationship? And why did Cid have
this mask in the first place?)
*sigh* All this thinking is giving me a headache...
